## SliderLabel.disabled property

The disabled state of the label. This is generally controlled by the parent [Slider](./fast-foundation.slider.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
disabled: boolean;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: disabled
